short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick Look browser extension allows to lookover the description of link on hover without actually opening the link.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick Sight (Link Description)
Enhance your browsing experience with Quick Sight!

Quick Sight is a versatile browser extension designed to provide instant link descriptions on hover. Save time and enhance your productivity by quickly understanding the content behind any link without opening it. Perfect for research, daily reading, and efficient browsing.

Key Features:
Instant Link Descriptions: Hover over any link to see a brief description, saving you the hassle of clicking through.
Customizable: Use the options page to tailor the extension to your needs. Disable temporarily directly from extension popup menu if not required. Also add links to blacklist or whitelist the websites where you don't need it.
Easy Bookmarking: Save and organize bookmarks with custom titles and URLs directly from the link descriptions.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple, intuitive interface for seamless browsing.
Quick Access: Add frequently visited links to specific folders for quick access.
Secure and Private: Your browsing data remains secure and private.
Make your browsing smarter and more efficient with Quick Sight!

BE WARNED: The extension was built for personal use. It may have bugs (not the bugs which may break the browser or something, it just may not work for extracting details of all websites) and might not work for all websites alike. Published the add-on to avoid manually reloading the extension on every browser restart, and it can be useful to others as well.

Found Bugs? Report it here!
| https://report-bugs.vercel.app
